articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Notepad.exe, now an actively maintained app, has gotten its inevitable AI update - Ars Technica
articles.description: Other Windows Insider updates include new CPU instructions for Prism x86 emulator.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Mistral launches a moderation API - TechCrunch
articles.description: AI startup Mistral has launched an API to moderate possibly toxic — or otherwise problematic — text in a range of languages.
articles.content:
AI startup Mistral has launched a new API for content moderation.
The API, which is the same API that powers moderation in Mistral’s Le Chat chatbot platform, can be tailored to specific application… [+2223 chars]
